Detailed Description

This is a sub-structure in CSL_Aif2CommonSetup. This structure is used for configuring the parameters of protocol decoder which are common to all links.

Field Documentation

Uint16 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::AxCOffsetWin

Reception timing window width parameter. Indicates the window size for searching the radio frame boundary identified by TS=0

CSL_Aif2PdChConfig CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdChConfig[128]

Pd 128 Dma channel configuration

CSL_Aif2PdChConfig1 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdChConfig1[128]

Pd 128 Dma channel configuration 1

CSL_Aif2CppiDio CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdCppiDioSel

For streams that are AxC, use DB as a circular RAM which will feed DIO DMA. (WCDMA use DIO) otherwise, DB is used as a FIFO for AxC traffic and will feed CPPI DMA

Uint16 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdFrameMsgTc[128]

Pd Frame message terminal counter for OBSAI and CPRI

CSL_Aif2FrameCounter CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdFrameTC[6]

Pd frame and symbol terminal counting value to calculate sop and eop of packet

Uint32 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdRadtTC

Max expected terminal count value for the RadT timer value. Used for creating a exected timing window

CSL_Aif2PdRoute CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::PdRoute[128]

Pd route

Uint32 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::TddEnable1[128]

TDD symbol enable/disable from symbol 16 ~ 47

Uint32 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::TddEnable2[128]

TDD symbol enable/disable from symbol 48 ~ 79

Uint32 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::TddEnable3[128]

TDD symbol enable/disable from symbol 80 ~ 111

Uint32 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::TddEnable4[128]

TDD symbol enable/disable from symbol 112 ~ 143

Uint16 CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::TsWatchDogCount

TS: OBSAI time stamp watch dog timer count duration. Counts n x 64 sys_clks

Bool CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::WatchDogEopAdd

Controls circuit to simply report or to report and add an EOP if the wdog fails on an expected EOP

CSL_Aif2PdWatchDogReport CSL_Aif2PdCommonSetup::WatchDogReport

Report every missed WDog fail, or report only fails of missing EOP
